# 微信公众平台开发文档

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/weixin-gongzhong-pingtai-kaifa-wendang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/weixin-gongzhong-pingtai-kaifa-wendang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install weixin-gongzhong-pingtai-kaifa-wendang
weixin-gongzhong-pingtai-kaifa-wendang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g weixin-gongzhong-pingtai-kaifa-wendang
weixin-gongzhong-pingtai-kaifa-wendang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
